sqlMap.select: select a.email, a.mobile, a.logon_user_name, (select m.com_info_full_status from abiz.core_member_info m where m.member_id=a.member_id and rownum<=1) com_info_full_status, a.mic_log_name, to_char(a.member_id) member_id, to_char(a.user_id) user_id, c.com_status, nvl(d.com_name, c.com_name) com_name, b.user_name, b.gender, nvl(d.tel_national_no, c.tel_national_no) tel_national_no, nvl(d.tel_country_no, c.tel_country_no) tel_country_no, nvl(d.com_tel, c.com_tel) com_tel, c.com_country, c.com_province, c.com_city, a.platform_name from abiz.core_logon_info a, abiz.core_user_search b, abiz.core_company_maint c, abiz.core_company_search d where a.user_id = b.user_id and a.member_id = c.member_id(+) and a.member_id = d.member_id(+) and a.user_role = '0' and a.business_flag = '1' and a.email = #email#
select l.com_id from abiz.core_logon_info_cn l where l.com_id = #memberIdOrUserName#
select l.com_id from abiz.core_logon_info_cn l where l.log_user_name = #memberIdOrUserName#

SELECT a.ABIZ_COM_ID, a.ABIZ_MEMBER_ID as MEMBER_ID, B.USER_ID FROM ABIZ.CORE_COMPANY_CN_MAINT_CHK a, ABIZ.CORE_LOGON_INFO b WHERE a.COM_ID = #comId# AND a.ABIZ_MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID and b.user_role='0' and rownum<=1

SELECT A.MEMBER_ID||'' MEMBER_ID,A.COM_NAME, B.EMAIL, c.user_name || DECODE (C.GENDER, '0', '女士', '先生') USER_NAME FROM CORE_COMPANY_MAINT a, CORE_LOGON_INFO b, CORE_USER_MAINT c, inquiry_info d WHERE a.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID AND B.USER_ROLE = '0' AND b.BUSINESS_FLAG = '1' AND B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND d.INQUIRY_ID = #relationId# AND D.MEMBER_ID = a.MEMBER_ID

SELECT A.MEMBER_ID||'' MEMBER_ID,A.COM_NAME, B.EMAIL, c.user_name || DECODE (C.GENDER, '0', '女士', '先生') USER_NAME FROM CORE_COMPANY_MAINT a, CORE_LOGON_INFO b, CORE_USER_MAINT c, PROVIDER_RECRUIT_INFO d WHERE a.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID AND B.USER_ROLE = '0' AND b.BUSINESS_FLAG = '1' AND B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND d.RECRUIT_ID = #relationId# AND D.MEMBER_ID = a.MEMBER_ID

SELECT A.MEMBER_ID||'' MEMBER_ID, A.COM_NAME, B.EMAIL, c.user_name || DECODE (C.GENDER, '0', '女士', '先生') USER_NAME FROM CORE_COMPANY_MAINT a, CORE_LOGON_INFO b, CORE_USER_MAINT c, ETPRS_DEMAND_TOPIC d WHERE a.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID AND B.USER_ROLE = '0' AND b.BUSINESS_FLAG = '1' AND B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND d.ETPRS_TOPIC_ID = #relationId# AND D.MEMBER_ID = a.MEMBER_ID

select * from (select a.* from abiz.core_attachment a where not exists (select 1 from abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '0' and b.relation_id = a.attachment_id) and a.delete_flag = '1' and DBMS_LOB.GETLENGTH(A.ATTACHMENT_CONTENT) > 0 union all
select a.* from abiz.core_attachment a, abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '0' and b.relation_id = a.attachment_id and a.updated_time > b.last_updated_time) rs where 1 = 1 and rownum <= 100

select * from (select a.* from abiz.core_company_photo a where not exists (select 1 from abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '1' and b.relation_id = a.com_photo_id) and a.pic_status not in ('4', '5') and DBMS_LOB.GETLENGTH(A.PIC_ORIGINAL) > 0 union all
select a.* from abiz.core_company_photo a, abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '1' and b.relation_id = a.com_photo_id and a.check_time > b.last_updated_time) rs where 1 = 1 and rownum <= 100

select * from (select a.* from abiz.core_certificate_photo a where not exists (select 1 from abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '2' and b.relation_id = a.certificate_photo_id) and a.pic_status not in ('4', '5') and DBMS_LOB.GETLENGTH(A.PIC_ORIGINAL) > 0 union all
select a.* from abiz.core_certificate_photo a, abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '2' and b.relation_id = a.certificate_photo_id and a.check_time > b.last_updated_time) rs where 1 = 1 and rownum <= 100

select * from (select a.* from abiz.inquiry_prod_photo a where not exists (select 1 from abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '3' and b.relation_id = a.photo_id) and a.pic_status not in ('4', '5') and DBMS_LOB.GETLENGTH(A.PIC_ORIGINAL) > 0 union all
select a.* from abiz.inquiry_prod_photo a, abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '3' and b.relation_id = a.photo_id and a.check_time > b.last_updated_time) rs where 1 = 1 and rownum <= 100

select * from (select a.* from abiz.quotation_photo a where not exists (select 1 from abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '4' and b.relation_id = a.quotation_photo_id) and a.pic_status not in ('4', '5') and DBMS_LOB.GETLENGTH(A.PIC_ORIGINAL) > 0 union all
select a.* from abiz.quotation_photo a, abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '4' and b.relation_id = a.quotation_photo_id and a.check_time > b.last_updated_time) rs where 1 = 1 and rownum <= 100

select * from (select a.* from abiz.brand_photo a where not exists (select 1 from abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '5' and b.relation_id = a.photo_id) and a.pic_status not in ('4', '5') and DBMS_LOB.GETLENGTH(A.PIC_ORIGINAL) > 0 union all
select a.* from abiz.brand_photo a, abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '5' and b.relation_id = a.photo_id and a.check_time > b.last_updated_time) rs where 1 = 1 and rownum <= 100

select * from (select a.* from ABIZ.MERCHANDISE_PHOTO a where not exists (select 1 from abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '6' and b.relation_id = A.MERCHANDISE_PHOTO_ID) and a.pic_status not in ('4', '5') and DBMS_LOB.GETLENGTH(A.PIC_ORIGINAL) > 0) rs where 1 = 1 and rownum <= 100

select * from (select a.* from abiz.banner_recommend a where not exists (select 1 from abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '8' and b.relation_id = a.banner_id) and DBMS_LOB.GETLENGTH(A.BANNER_PIC) > 0) rs where 1 = 1 and rownum <= 100

select * from (select a.* from abiz.efpg_apply_info a where not exists (select 1 from abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '9' and b.relation_id = a.efpg_apply_id) and DBMS_LOB.GETLENGTH(A.OFFLINE_DOWNLOAD_FILE) > 0 union all
select a.* from abiz.efpg_apply_info a, abiz.ffs_att_pic_log b where b.relation_type = '9' and b.relation_id = a.efpg_apply_id and a.updated_time > b.last_updated_time) rs where 1 = 1 and rownum <= 100

SELECT to_char(A.KEYWORD_ID) KEYWORD_ID, A.KEYWORD, (SELECT TO_CHAR(wm_concat(B.CAT_CODE)) FROM (SELECT * FROM ABIZ.DEMAND_KEYWORD_CATEGORY ORDER BY prod_num DESC) b WHERE B.KEYWORD_ID = A.KEYWORD_id) cat_codes FROM abiz.demand_keyword a WHERE A.DELETE_FLAG = '1' and not exists (select c.keyword_id from abiz.demand_keyword_log c where c.keyword_id = a.keyword_id) AND ROWNUM <= 100
select count(1) from EFPG_DEMAND_INFO where ADDED_TIME between trunc(sysdate) and to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
